评论详情: Bought this sweater for new years, fast shipping! Quality is amazing kept me warm all night and wasn’t too heavy or hot. I got a lot of compliments. Bought XL and fits like L
Great but a little small and i got xxl
Fits a bit small than normal sizes , xxl fits like a L and L like a S
Cute funny stylish!  Soft and warm
i love the chnage of color from the black one, with the price  it is good quality and a little heavy , i got it oversized if u want a baggy look
Loved this sweater, but it started to stretch out on me as if it was losing its original shape. I didn’t like that. Take your pics when you first put it on or down size. 7/10
